title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and garnish with parsley. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through. Set aside.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic, ginger, and remaining spices. Cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and add cooked chicken.
Simmer for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a blender, combine garlic, anchovies, egg yolk, lemon juice, and mustard.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while blending until emulsified.
Add Worcestershire sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Toss lettuce with dressing until well coated.
Top with croutons and Parmesan shavings. Serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Delicious homemade cookies with chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Gradually stir in flour mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then transfer to wire rack.
